scripts.start: parcel watch src/js/*.js src/styles/scss/main.scss src/styles/components.scss src/styles/home.scss src/styles/orders.scss src/styles/profile.scss src/styles/register.scss src/styles/style.scss src/styles/tsheet.scss --dist-dir public/dist && shx cp -r src/images-videos public/dist && shx cp -r src/audio public/dist
scripts.build: parcel build src/js/*.js src/styles/scss/main.scss src/styles/components.scss src/styles/home.scss src/styles/orders.scss src/styles/profile.scss src/styles/register.scss src/styles/style.scss src/styles/tsheet.scss --dist-dir public/dist && shx cp -r src/images-videos public/dist && shx cp -r src/audio public/dist
